pyscnet.Plotting¶

pyscnet.Plotting.net_plot¶

@author: mwu

pyscnet.Plotting.net_plot.create_app(gnetdata, grn_method, top_links, resolution=0.5, layout='cose')[source]¶
Parameters

  • gnetdata – Gnetdata object.

  • grn_method – str, defualt None. It refers to the links table stored in NetAttrs.

  • top_links – int, default None.

  • resolution – float, default 0.5. resolution for gene module detection.

  • layout – str, default cose. Network layout.

Returns

dashboard html

pyscnet.Plotting.net_plot.dynamic_netShow(gnetdata, filename, node_size=50, node_community='all', html_size=['500px', '1800px'], bgcolor='#222222', font_color='white', **kwarg)[source]¶
Parameters

  • gnetdata – Gnetdata object

  • filename – str, save as filename

  • node_size – int, default 50.

  • node_community – str or list, default all.

  • html_size – list, default [“1200px”, “1600px”]

  • font_color – string, default white

  • bgcolor – string, default #222222

Returns

None

pyscnet.Plotting.net_plot.geneCorrelation(gnetdata, gene, cell_clusterid, select_by, order_by=None, scale_data=True, save_as=None, figsize=None, **kwargs)[source]¶
Parameters

  • gnetdata – Gnetdata object

  • gene – list, default None.

  • cell_clusterid – str, default None. cell with cell_clusterid will be selected

  • select_by – str, default None. key of filtering cells

  • order_by – str, default None. key of ordering cells

  • scale_data – bool, default True. whether or not scale the data

  • save_as – str, default None. filepath+filename

  • figsize – list, default None. a list of int defining figure size

  • kwargs – additional parameters passed to seaborn.clustermap()

Returns

None

pyscnet.Plotting.net_plot.geneHeatmap(gnetdata, gene, cell_clusterid, select_by, order_by=None, scale=True, cmap='RdBu', save_as=None, **kwargs)[source]¶
Parameters

  • gnetdata – Gnetdata object, default None

  • gene – list, default None.

  • cell_clusterid – str, default None. cell with cell_clusterid will be selected

  • select_by – str, default None. key of filtering cells

  • order_by – str, default None. key of ordering cells

  • scale – bool, default True. whether or not scale the data

  • cmap – str, default ‘RdBu’. string denoting colors in clustermap

  • save_as – str, default None. filepath+filename

  • kwargs – additional parameters passed to seaborn.clustermap()

Returns

None

pyscnet.Plotting.net_plot.net_hierarchy_plot(gnetdata, filename=None, **kwarg)[source]¶

create a hierarchy gene net plot

Parameters

  • gnetdata – Gnetdata object

  • filename – str, default None.

  • kwarg – additional parameters passed to graph_tool.all.draw_hierarchy()

Returns

None

pyscnet.Plotting.net_plot.net_matrix_plot(gnetdata, filename=None, highlight_path=None, **kwarg)[source]¶
Parameters

  • gnetdata – Gnetdata object.

  • filename – str, default None.

  • highlight_path – list, default None. a list of gene Nodes.

  • kwarg – additional parameters passed to graph_tool.all.graph_draw()

Returns

None
